Is this technology transferable to the vape space or is XXII strictly a combustible play

XXII if you go back and look at the date our pmta APP was submitted and sort of countdown what phase they were in since then and consider that as of the last conference call they are now in phase 4 with site inspection done I think we could literally see approval Tomorrow even The company says they expect its a happen this summer but that almost seems late compared to how quickly this is moved along I guess we will see godhelpthepanda

XXII I just want to say two things again folks Number one site inspection completed I bought my first stock in 1978 41 years ago Ive been fulltime in the market for the last 25 years I have never seen something with the FDA not get approved once it progressed to that level And secondly and probably even more relevant then that is this is the FDA policy The FDA came out and said all tobacco will be VLN There is no other vln besides our VLN Their policy was arrived at by using XXII technology and products And so I guess all that there is left to say is PREPARE FOR APPROVAL
